block_comment: The block of code is responsible for setting the next state of the "R_ctrl_jmp_direct" signal, as indicated by the assigned current state of the "D_ctrl_jmp_direct" signal. This assignment operation occurs in the continuous assignment statement in Verilog, which means that the value of the "D_ctrl_jmp_direct" signal is continuously monitored, and any changes to it get immediately reflected in the "R_ctrl_jmp_direct_nxt" signal.
